scripts.clear:cache: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules apps/*/package-lock.json apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next
scripts.fresh: npm run clear:cache && npm i && npm run format
scripts.fresh:start: npm run fresh && npm run dev
scripts.fresh:start:bball: npm run fresh && npm run dev:bball
scripts.fresh:start:admin: npm run fresh && npm run dev:admin
